imdb.title: Sore ga seiyû!
imdb.plot: Based on the Dōjinshi (self-published works) created by accomplished voice actress Masumi Asano and Hayate the Combat Butler creator Kenjiro Hata, Seiyu's Life! gives a true insider's view of the strange little things that h...

episodes.title: Recording
episodes.plot: It's Futaba Ichinose's first recording session for an anime filled with veterans and popular seiyu. Will she be able to do her job properly?

episodes.title: Web Radio
episodes.plot: Futaba, Ichigo, and Rin start their web radio show for Bodhisattvon, but who knew it was so hard to talk coherently on the radio?

episodes.title: Unit
episodes.plot: What will the girls do now that Bodhisattvon is over? Will Futaba be stuck working at the convenience store forever?

episodes.title: Music Video Filming
episodes.plot: As Futaba starts getting busier with EARPHONES, she finds out that there will be an anime for series she was in the drama CD for last year.

episodes.title: Dubbing
episodes.plot: It's Futaba's first time dubbing a foreign movie, and Ichigo and Rin are at the same studio at the same time, each recording for non-anime voice work.

episodes.title: Self Care
episodes.plot: Futaba gets sick after overworking herself to try to catch up to the other two members of EARPHONES. Will she learn to take things at her own pace?

episodes.title: Assessment
episodes.plot: As Futaba's seiyu assessment draws near, she thinks about what she wants to do as a seiyu and in the future.
